org.elasticsearch.client

Class FilterClient.ClusterAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClusterAdminClient
      • org.elasticsearch.client.FilterClient.ClusterAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterAdminClient, ElasticsearchClient<ClusterAdminClient>
    Enclosing class:
    FilterClient

    public static class FilterClient.ClusterAdmin
extends AbstractClusterAdminClient
    A ClusterAdminClient that contains another ClusterAdminClient which it uses as its basic source, possibly transforming the requests / responses along the way or providing additional functionality.
